gui.sillyrendering.config.title: sillyrendering configuration
Randomizes vertex position values when drawn, which causes texture faces to warp and move around the screen
Randomizes textures' UV values when drawn, which causes the texture to point to random offsets in it's texture atlas
Randomizes the normal values of each vertice on every texture when drawn
Randomizes the color of each vertice on every texture when drawn
Randomizes brightness values of each vertice on every texture when drawn
Uses sillyrendering's old random function (regular java.util.Random)
§aMay require a world reload to fully apply
§cIt may be difficult to edit sillyrendering's config while this is enabled, the fix is to edit the config file directly.
gui.sillyrendering.config.option_affects: All textures, including but not limited to:
